name: Priest
description: A religious figure in ceremonial robes, representing divine power, healing, and spiritual guidance.

person: A healer or spiritual guide who provides wisdom and comfort
A fanatic or false prophet who uses religion to manipulate others
creatureTrap: Divine creatures or beings blessed with healing powers
Cursed or corrupted religious sites with dangerous spiritual energy
place: Sacred temples or shrines that offer sanctuary and healing
Desecrated holy sites where divine power has been corrupted
treasure: Holy relics, blessed items, or divine magic that aids the faithful
Cursed religious artifacts that punish the unworthy
situation: Opportunities for healing, redemption, or spiritual growth
Religious conflicts or divine judgment that brings hardship
